name: Mini Car Club
description:
Get in the driver's seat and swerve your way around crazy obstacles! Collect coins to upgrade your abilities and unlock over 50 different vehicles.

Complete missions that will reward you and increase your score multiplier. Can you collect the entire fleet in Mini Car Club?!

FEATURES
◉ Change lanes to avoid crazy obstacles!
◉ Collect over 50 different vehicles!
◉ Upgrade your skills & abilities!
◉ Colorful and vivid HD graphics!
◉ Lightning fast controls!
◉ Endless fun for hours on end!
